corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: Even when common goals have been established , conflict may be generated during the planning process because of disagreement about the way in which these goals should be achieved .
